nodes.documentation: This contract allows for the creation and management of Polls
nodes.name: PollingStation

attributes.documentation: This contract allows for the creation and management of Polls
attributes.name: PollingStation

params._claimer: address of the claimer to be added

isClaimable().details: The contract is claimable when the 3 results are true.
isClaimable().return: bool: is a claimer, bool: is expired, bool: is not owner

isClaimer(address).return: true if the caller has been added as claimer, false, otherwise

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

read().return: (address: owner of this contract, uint: the expiration date, bool: is caller a claimers?)

params._claimer: address of the claimer to be removed

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params._expirationTime: the new expiration time for this contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

addClaimer(address).notice: Adds a new claimer to the contract

claim().notice: Claim ownership of the contract, once the max inactive time is reached.  Only addresses in claimers can claim, unless the array is empty.

getExpirationTime().notice: Gets the current expiration time set in this contract

isClaimable().notice: Checks if the expiration date is passed and contract can be claimed.

isClaimer(address).notice: returns true if the caller has been added as claimer on this contract

read().notice: returns the owner of this contract, the expiration date and if the caller is one of the claimers

removeClaimer(address).notice: Removes a claimer from the contract

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

setExpirationTime(uint256).notice: allows the owner to set a new expiration time to extend the ownership of this contract

userdoc.notice: This contract allows for the creation and management of Polls
